/>
VII.i.3.D.1.a
.
Definition:  Parents in the Same Parental Line
Parents in the same parental line
refers to Veteran-parents of the same sex (both male or both female) that are not, nor ever have been, married to one another.  This includes
biological parents
adoptive parents, and
stepparents.
Examples
:
A Veteran-father and a Veteran-mother are
not
in the same parental line.
Two female Veterans that are married to one another are
not
in the same parental line.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Children With Two Veteran-Parents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
